Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In order to understand the influence of ratios between the donor polymer and acceptor , thicknesses of the photoactive layer , and the annealing temperatures on the photovoltaic properties , the current density - voltage ( J-V ) characteristics of the PBDT-TDPP-S:PC71BM - based devices at different ratios , thicknesses , and annealing temperatures are shown in Figures S4 , S5 , and S6 , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| PBDT-TDPP-S |
| PC71BM |

Note that I have presented the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

I removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property":

* ratios between the donor polymer and acceptor (this refers to a ratio of two materials, not a material property value)
* thicknesses of the photoactive layer (this refers to a physical dimension, not a material property value)
* annealing temperatures (this refers to a thermal treatment temperature, not a material property value)
